channel.title: zettelkasten on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: How I use Roam Research for D&D: Session Notes
item.description: In case you thought this site was all about performance and load testing, surprise! It’s not. If you’ve talked to me personally for longer than ten minutes in the last year, there’s a pretty good chance I’ve mentioned Roam Research, or the note-taking and learning methodology called Zettelkasten. Sorrynotsorry. I’ve been obsessed since I discovered it. To say Roam Research is a note-taking device is like saying Bitcoin is currency: yes, it IS that, but also so much more.
